item.title: How Evals Help Build Reliable AI
item.description:
I finished 2025 with a negative AI post, so let’s start 2026 with a positive one.

I’m leading a project for an AI-based tool, and something we are heavily experimenting with is eval-driven development. Technical readers may immediately associate this with test-driven development, and there are similarities, but because AI is non-deterministic, there is more going on here.

In this post I want to share how we are leveraging evals in practice, why they are so important in AI projects, which tools are actually useful, and what people usually mean when they talk about EDD.
